org.springframework.amqp.core

Interface AmqpManagementOperations

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RabbitManagementTemplate
    Deprecated. 
    since 2.1 in favor of direct usage of target REST API client.

    @Deprecated
public interface AmqpManagementOperations
    Interface specifying management operations.
    Since:
    1.5
    Author:
    Gary Russell

        List<Exchange> getExchanges(String vhost)
        Deprecated. 
        Get all exchanges in the provided vhost. Only DirectExchange, FanoutExchange, HeadersExchange and TopicExchanges are returned.

        the exchanges.
